entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON source generator fails with recursive collection type graphs #66421
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Illegal reordering of field read and call on implicit byref #66414
    7.0.0
  • Children could not evaluated in Blazor Web Assembly. #66401
  • area-Extensions-DependencyInjection About creating custom service providers #66394
  • [Mono] Intrinsify API's of System.Numerics.Vector and new API's of System.Runtime.Intrinsics.{128,256} on Amd64 #66392
    7.0.0
  • System.Management has a dependency on .NET Framework #66386
  • InvokeVoidAsync Performance Issue arch-wasm #66384
  • Updating to latest VS `17.1.1` and SDK `6.0.201` breaks web application builder #66383
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_487702/DevDiv_487702/DevDiv_487702.sh #66377
  • Fix triple slash exceptions on `BlockingCollection.Take()` method #66374
  • Timeout running `System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CustomConverterTests.GetConverter_Poco_WriteThrowsNotSupportedException` on mono interpreter #66371
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\Monitor\\EnterExit08\\EnterExit08.cmd #66370
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #66368

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: DependencyRootEntryAttribute #65764
  • [windows][x64] Build failed in CI #66380
  • CLR msbuild builds fail with unresolved external symbol RedirectedHandledJITCaseForGCStress_Stub #65562
  • Proposal: Remove covariance on array #66376
  • Odd behaviour when unzipping unicode string on net6.0 compared to netcoreapp3.1 and net5.0 #66405
  • Test failure System.IO.Ports.Tests.OpenDevices.OpenDevices01 #62068
  • Memory leaks when reverse P/Invoke is called from unmanaged thread #64509
    7.0.0
  • ReadToEndAsync_WithCancellation test failing due to lack of free space #66395
  • profiler.elt work item test failures in slowpatheltenter #60018
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/rundownvalidation/rundownvalidation/rundownvalidation.sh #54801
    7.0.0
  • Mono EventPipe test suite crash #66382
  • profiler.multiple failing on MacOS 12.0 #64765
    7.0.0
  • Remove ObjectDisposedException triple slash from CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested #66369
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Tests Outerloop tests failing with SIGKILL #66396
  • `System.IO.Tests` getting killed (OOM?) for `Libraries Test Run release mono Linux arm64 Debug` #56165
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests work item failing with SIGKILL #65791
  • SslStream tests show use after dispose handle in System.Net.Security.SecureChannel.GenerateToken #47195
    Future
  • API Proposal: Debug.Assert overloads with interpolated string handler #53211
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_NetworkStream_Renegotiation_Succeeds #52096
    Future
  • Test failure: SimpleScenario_UseGETVerb_Success #57123
    Future
  • Test failure: DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok #57342
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime #65858
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: \"api.nuget.org\") #59508
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/threadpool/bindhandle/bindhandlenull/bindhandlenull.sh #66274
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\threadpool\\bindhandle\\bindhandleinvalid6\\bindhandleinvalid6.cmd #66273
    7.0.0
  • Improve ClrVirtualAllocAligned for unix platforms #3976
    Future
  • Add native code coverage for Windows #3987
    Future
  • need way to configure per-test xunit attributes #4274
    Future
  • Question: Checking for managed exceptions from the hosting APIs #4339
    Future
  • Verify the monotonic nature of Environment.TickCount under various conditions in OSX #4394
    Future
  • RunTest: Have a facility to specify Timeout #4492
    Future
  • Consider Reorganizing outputs similarly to VS convention #4923
    Future
  • Archlinux - mscorlib build is failing because of dotnet cli native #5645
    Future
  • build.sh - Adding an option "static" that would build the native lib statically #5661
    Future
  • Gazillion warnings from enabling building tests on Win8.1 x64 Debug #7167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Downgrade the Roslyn version used by the Regex source generator to be 4.0.1 instead of 4.2.0 #66423
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix JsonSerializer src-gen issues with reference handler feature #66422
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix random printf from JIT #66420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Dead code removal, minor fixes #66418
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Remove _socket field from HttpConnection #66416
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Revert "Do not mark implicit byrefs with GTF_GLOB_REF" #66415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix implicit nullchecks for floats on arm64 #66413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Always use SIMD features #66411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add changes required by emscripten 3.1.4. #66410
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Narrow for for Vector{64, 128} on Arm64 #66409
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Cleanup todo items from defines-todo.cmake #66408
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
  • Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #66404
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement System.Decimal.Scale #66403
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reenable compiler warning 4244 under coreclr/ #66398
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Reenable SslStreamNetworkStreamTests on OSX #66393
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector Dot product and Sum on Arm64 #66391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check gtClassProfileCandidateInfo before instrumentation #66388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not assume containment #66385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable timing out test on mono #66381
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Bump runtime workload manifest to 300 / update emsdk dependency #66373
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.MAUI

Merged

  • [MAUI][PERF] Add IPA file usage for iOS Maui SOD #66358
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't build IJW and COM host tests for mono #66400
  • Extend Equals/StartsWith auto-vectorization for OrdinalIgnoreCase #66095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #66353
  • skip the ReadToEndAsync_WithCancellation test if there is not enough disk space #66397
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add dependencies on EMSDK manifest bands for coherency in installer #65478
  • Add Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime #66372
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reduce the amount of memory allocated by System.IO.Tests #66387
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update CancellationToken.cs #66399
    documentation, area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add a helper function to check that a method has the [Int… #66359
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Move Array.CreateInstance methods to shared CoreLib #66025
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Remove compiler warning suppression 2 #66375
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix early stack offset and size computations for ARM32 with FEATURE_FASTTAILCALL enabled #66367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix cancellation race condition in PipeStream cancellation callback #65909
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not mark implicit byrefs with GTF_GLOB_REF #66266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some exception messages for BindHandle-like cases #66326
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Do not propagate RHS flags in block morphing #66291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove compiler warning suppression #66234
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Rename `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` -> `LibraryImportAttribute` #66307
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Moving "Generic Math" in box and making it no longer experimental #65731
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #66352
  • Updating Unicode files to use 14.0.0 #66362
    area-System.Globalization
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run superpmi-replay pipeline on JIT PRs #66063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cloning improvements #66257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add table of testing configurations #66347
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Backport skipping System.Text.Json tests for the aot configuration #66366
  • Implement {Try}HashData on asymmetric algorithms #66349
    area-System.Security
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow marshalling IL_STUB compilation for ndirect methods using crossgen2 if SPC.dll is in the same bubble #66139
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Inject existing object into MEF2 #66364
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [monoapi] Add mono_method_get_unmanaged_callers_only_ftnptr #66299
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.MAUI
  • Use StartsWith(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) in RegexCompiler / source generator #66339
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • A better fix for #66242 #66335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor and improve MLL tests #66332
    area-Host
  • Clean up NonBacktracking DgmlWriter #66363
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add tests for `comhost` with managed host #66360
    area-Host
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.4
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65537
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 6.0.4

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] consuming return values from CT_INDIRECT #1862
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Could use a stub for __syscall_mprotect #1861

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support CT_INDIRECT calls #1863

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor 6 : "Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild" and a collocated JavaScript file with a .razor file cause a build error on the Ubuntu #24298
  • .NET 6.0.3 fails when installing from Windows Update #24294
  • Receiving the following error message after upgrading to .NET SDK 6.0.200 on MacOS: Error: 'Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005' [/var/folders/4d/cbxjxphj73931v78kt_h2vr80000gn/T/il11v5iq.ifv/WorkerExtensions.csproj] #24293
  • Compliation hard crash on deconstruction through generic-constrained interface #24292

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24302
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update CODEOWNERS #24253
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24265
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #24284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clarify NuGet version conflicts #24209
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Fix FSharp publishing #24287
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1653526 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the package DeploymentReleasesVersion #24266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24168
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #24281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #24285
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Syntactic ambiguity with `..` in range, list-remainder, spread syntaxes, and what should we do about them. #5904

Closed

  • Open issue: list-pattern questions for 1/3/2022 #5599

PullRequests

Updated

  • Clarify binding rules for `await foreach` #5898
  • Update ref field proposal #5899

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Comment Selection command doesn't work in .editorconfig file #60073
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpOutlining.OutliningConfigChange #60072
  • [Flaky test] GoToImplementationOpensProvisionalTabIfDocumentNotOpen #60071
  • Static abstract delegate creation within generic code cached into non-generic location #60069
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpRename.VerifyRenameInStandaloneFiles #60068
  • [Flaky test] Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.NetCoreTests.TestOpenProject_NetCoreApp #60066
  • "Create and assing field" generates code without spaces #60064
  • CrossAssemblySupportingAndNotSupportingCovariantReturns test throws if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60060
  • TestNullCoalesce_Dynamic test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60059
  • ControlFlowGraph for VB.NET declaration should generate implicit assignment #60056
  • Renaming a nested type should offer to update filename using Outer.Inner.cs convention #60054
    17.3
  • Relax file collapsing on navigation for Source Link #60049
    17.3
  • NullCoalescingOperatorWithTupleNames test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60046
  • ExternAliases4 test throws if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60045

Closed

  • Typing a semicolon should move the cursor to the end of the statement #59913
    17.3
  • Remove out of context suggestions from IntelliSense #59919
  • Visual Studio 2022. Sometime 'add using' code fix do not work for blazor web assembly #58091
    17.2
  • Auto Formatting Column Mode #59921
  • Automatically inserting code #59924
    Backlog
  • Show exception description in C# XML documentation #59925
  • C# LSP light bulbs don't indicate which Diagnostics they fix properly #59067
    17.2.P1
  • Additional tests for native integers #42452
    17.1
  • Converting DateTime into String results in Input String not in Correct Format #59640
    17.2
  • if (T is new()) VS or C# Compiler Issue #60057
  • IDE0017 code fix leaves redundant blank line before comment #46670
    Backlog
  • Csc task crash during build cancelation #59145
    17.2
  • VoidEvent test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60047
  • CoreCompile target claims the wrong input for signing key #59992
    17.2
  • CSharpRecommendationServiceRunner breaks on some bad syntax using a third party api #59714
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Dartlab tests to VS-Platform #60075
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the standalone template file name for 17.2 #60074
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #60070
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • use 4.2 version of the compiler to build #60065
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move json serializer options out of mef constructed part to avoid loa… #60063
    Area-IDE
  • Fix unnecessary assigment false positive for out argument #60062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update Language Feature Status for ref fields #60061
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove NuGet exception workaround #60055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • Pull on emit diagnostics in tests in a CI leg #60052
    Area-Compilers
  • Suppress file change notifications for VSFILECHG_Attr #60051
    Area-IDE
  • Update ToImmutableArrayAsync to work with all cancellation patterns #60050
    Area-IDE
  • Stabilize light bulb #60048
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add sleep in between installing extensions in integration prep #60042
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Fix reporting Hot Reload diagnostics for cshtml files #60041
    Area-Interactive, 17.2
  • Fix PoliCheck warning #60043
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • [LSP] Allow Razor to utilize C# LSP server in tests #59995
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Avoid Large Object Heap allocations in GetPrioritizedPendingDocuments #59944
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Trim leading blank lines in IDE0017 #59993
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Enable embedded languages to export the identifier they should be associated with in comments/attributes #59983
    Area-IDE
  • Add back logic for main-vs-deps branch #60037
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics: Call dispose and removed event handler that was unnnecessary #60039
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make call-hierarchy navigation cancellable #60024
    Area-IDE
  • KeyOriginatorFile is input to csc task #59999
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle optional exclamations in conditional access in RecommendationServiceRunner #60012
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main into features/semantic-snippets #60033
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60040
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60076
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Make solution crawler and diagnostics options global #59800
    Area-IDE
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Fix binding order for Dispose in async foreach #60022
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

    Area-Compilers, Community

    Area-IDE

    Area-Compilers

    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community

    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Support consumption scenarios for checked user-defined operators #60032
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate globalconfig #59002
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add IsFabricatedToken assert #60005
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Fix transition for cancelled light bulb in integration tests #60034
    Area-IDE
  • Use a longer timeout if we previously had a successful Source Link result #59698
    Area-IDE
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pseudo-locales don't work in Blazor WebAssembly #40630
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess #40628
    Test failures
  • Quarantine StreamPool_StreamIsInvalidState_DontReturnedToPool #40626
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyE2EWorksWithOldFoldersPresent #40619
    Test failures
  • CORS preflight requests is not properly evaluated? + unclear CORS documentation #40616
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing is broken in SDK 6.0.201 #40614
  • WebApplicationOptions.WebRootPath is ignored if a wwwroot folder exists #40613
  • Websocket .net core detect when client looses internet connectivity #40612
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor Wasm Authentication broken when window.opener is set (from anchor with target) #40610
    Backlog
  • Can't get RazorPageOptions from DI with version 6.0.3 of Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #40609
  • Blazor server - Using IJSStreamReference after browser reconnect throws "Cannot send data if the connection is not in the 'Connected' State" #40608
    6.0.x

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly won't start using WebAssembly.DevServer v6.0.3 #40611
  • Invoking an static method of JS Class inside OnAfterRenderAsync in First Render throw undefined class error #40621
  • Error boundaries are not catching all exceptions #40260
  • Generate dictionary keys in blazor @bind #40185
  • Use Vite in the SPA templates #40594
  • Quarantine GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #39985
    Test failures
  • Receiving a 401 on negotiate request to a secured signalR hub in browser #40615
  • Using HttpContextAccessor in Asp.NET Core hosted Blazor Web Assembly throws error #40590
  • Blazor WASM PWA not returning static files from wwwroot on first request after publish due to service worker cache #39592
  • Be able to override "SendByteArray","ReadJSDataAsStreamAsync" and "TransmitStreamAsync" in subclass of JSRunTime #40607
  • OnConnectedAsync intermittently not called #40465
  • Build ASP.NET Core from Source error #40596
  • Action method return badrequest if parameter are not provided #40603

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess #40629
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android[ Delay loading of Flyout content on Shell until the user opens the Flyout #5178
  • Fix LoadedFiresOnPushedPage on iOS #5177
  • ViewExtensions.GetViewTransform always returns 0 on Android #5169
  • Crash during navigation with Navigation page #5168
  • Grid Rows overlap #5165
  • AppIcon shows a border on windows taskbar #5162
  • ShellContent IsEnabledProperty does not work #5161
  • [iOS] Slider's MaximumValue does not change after initial assignment #5160
  • FontImageSource displays small box instead of requested font icon #5157
  • Enable indicator view to be usable with collectionView, and bindableLayout(scrollView) #5156

Closed

  • Exception using OnPlatform with View type #4509
  • [Windows] Templated IndicatorView not rendering #4290
  • Proposal: Introduce Shell as the default way of using/learning .NET MAUI (templates, documentation, etc.) #4522
  • DisplayActionSheet not opening the action dialog on Windows #3726
  • Blazor hybrid project template updates #4127
  • Shell Tab Icon color is always gray #5164
  • [iOS]The location is null when Geolocation.GetLocationAsync(); is called #5132
  • The focus event does not fire on Editor #5126
  • WebView needs Width and Height for Filling screen #2203

PullRequests

Created

  • [msbuild] %(MauiXaml.SubType) defaults to Designer #5176
  • Move `UseMauiApp` call into "Controls" #5174
  • [WIP] Discard Dismissed DatePickerDialog #5173
  • [android] update built-in AOT profiles #5171
  • Implement FillRule property in PolygonHandler and PolylineHandler #5166

Merged

  • Route Shell Modal Navigation through ShellSection #5151

  • Fix branch typo in dev doc #5175
  • [X] Convert element before adding to collections #5120
  • DisplayActionSheet later #5047
    platform/windows 🪟
  • 😭 Comment out the unpackaged build 😭 #5170
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Add Shell to default template #4524
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix issue invalidating the Clipping Path #5167
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [essentials] minor perf improvement around app actions #5155
    area/essentials 🍞, area/perf 🏎️
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220309112102164 to loc #5163
  • [Housekeeping] Update the Gallery with more focus samples #5133
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • FabricBot rule to add area/controls to issues when control-X label is applied #5141

Updated

  • [X] Simplify OnPlatformExtension #4829

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteException (0x80004005): SQLite Error 15: 'locking protocol'. #27603
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is connecting #27602
  • Error - Cannot resolve the collation conflict between "Latin1_General_CI_AI" and "Latin1_General_CS_AS" in the equal to operation. #27601
  • Exceptions after upgrading from 6.0.1 to 6.0.3/6.0.2 #27600
  • Proper way to seed test data in EF Core 6.0.2 #27599
  • Investigate slow text templating tests on Linux #27598
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27423
    7.0.0
  • Question: Obfuscation guidelines #27581
  • Can entities have a foreign key to an individual owned item of another entity (OwnsMany)? #27569
  • Projection of entity with nullable struct fails on ternary operator (efcore 6 breaking change) #27561

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #27423 - Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27589
  • Store name information on TableBuilder #27604
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #27596
  • Scaffolding: Enable text templates #27565
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27593
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces #27483
  • Attribute for configuring composite primary keys #27571
